ygData.subject: Re: Mail Runs and a L50 (SPOILER)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... the ... No big secret there, Eve is one of the FedEx bards in Qeynos (at the guild). Her husband Tarn (I think) is also a FedEx bard that stands right
ygData.messageBody:
>Someone mentioned the apparently bisexual and polygamous "Eve", whose name
>is dropped by the "postmasters" after a successful delivery. I've found no
>sign of Eve, but it sounds like she might be the key to the next step in
the
>quest. Whether that step exists yet is another matter.
>
>Mannerism (on The Rathe)
No big secret there, Eve is one of the FedEx bards in Qeynos (at the guild).
Her husband Tarn (I think) is also a FedEx bard that stands right beside
her.
-=B=-
